data.title: Portland's Premier Movie-Going Experience
data.meta_description: Experience the magic of cinema at the historic Hollywood Theatre in Portland. Enjoy diverse films, special events, & community programs.
data.text:
The Hollywood Theatre proudly presents: Movie Madness

Movie Madness is a Portland institution. Opened in April of 1991, the iconic video store houses a world-class collection of 90,000+ titles and a collection of film props that includes William Holdenâ€™s shotgun from THE WILD BUNCH, the knife from PSYCHO, an ear used in BLUE VELVET, and more.
